comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Oberleutnant Eduard Ritter von Dostler (3 February 1892 - 21 August 1917), Pour le Mérite, Royal House Order of Hohenzollern, Military Order of Max Joseph, Iron Cross, was a German World War I fighter ace credited with 26 victories. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eduard_Ritter_von_Dostler
